3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: Maimunah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to lay his head in the lap of one of us and recite Qur'an while she was menstruating, and one of us would take the mat to the Masjid and spread it out when she was menstruating

chapter.ara-name: باب بَسْطِ الْحَائِضِ الْخُمْرَةَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Menstruating Woman Spreading Out A Mat In The Masjid
